description: This operation returns a list of all backups (recovery points) in a paginated format that were included in the search job. If a search does not display an expected backup in the results, you can call this operation to display each backup included in the search. Any backups that were not included because they have a FAILED status from a permissions issue will be displayed, along with a status message. Only recovery points with a backup index that has a status of ACTIVE will be included in search results. If the index has any other status, its status will be displayed along with a status message.

parameters.name: SearchJobIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique string that specifies the search job.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The next item following a partial list of returned backups included in a search job. For example, if a request is made to return MaxResults number of backups, NextToken allows you to return more items in your list starting at the location pointed to by the next token.

nested_items.name: Results
nested_items.description: The recovery points returned the results of a search job.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: This is the status of the search job backup result.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: This is the status message included with the results.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: This is the resource type of the search.

nested_items.name: BackupResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the backup resources.

nested_items.name: SourceResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the source resources.

nested_items.name: IndexCreationTime
nested_items.description: This is the creation time of the backup index.

nested_items.name: BackupCreationTime
nested_items.description: This is the creation time of the backup (recovery point).

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next item following a partial list of returned backups included in a search job.
